description: A 33-year-old man will appear at Swansea Magistrates' Court on Wednesday.
title: Swansea: Man charged with Leanne Williams' murder
title_page: Swansea: Man charged with Leanne Williams' murder - BBC News
maintext:
A 33-year-old man has been charged with murder after a woman's body was found at her home.
He will appear at Swansea Magistrates' Court on Wednesday.
Leanne Williams, 47, was found by police officers at her house on Gomer Road in Townhill, Swansea, on 27 February.
South Wales Police said a 41-year-old man who was arrested as part of the investigation has been released from custody.
